Summary I’m a technical business professional with fifteen years experience in higher education. I’ve had the opportunity to wear many different hats as a programmer, business analyst, report analyst, and product owner.  
 
My most recent achievement was an effort to implemented Salesforce with in the School of Humanities and Sciences at Stanford University. Salesforce replaced a paper-based system managing a student’s 4-year course of study within the Human Biology program. The new system allowed for a more transparent view of planning between student, faculty advisors, and program administrators.  
 
Specialties: Salesforce, PeopleSoft, Oracle, Development, Analysis, Reporting, Business Intelligence, Process Improvement, Project Management
